name: ~ABC Açaí Berry~
description:
ABC Açaí Berry soft gel.
Lose weight 8-10 pounds in just 30 days!!

ABC Açaí Berry Soft Gel is a product that helps reduce the fat and leave your skin smooth as it has detoxifying elements. Açaí Berry Slimming Capsules have a unique formula with pure Acai extract and other carefully selected Chinese herbs delivering great results!

Some of the features of ABC ACAI Berry:
* Original formula, exclusive ABC açaí berry capsules.
* ABC Berry capsules are highly concentrated with açaí berries and Chinese herbs.
* ABC Berry has no side effects so it is a 100% NATURAL product!
* EACH ORIGINAL CAPSULE HAS THE 'ABC' LASER MARK ON THEM.
*ABC letters on the box is written embossed in silver.
* Lose 8-10 pounds in 30 days!!

                                                
* Decreases Appetite
* Increases Metabolism
* No Side Effects

30 x 500mg capsules

How to use: Take 1 capsule in the morning with your coffee or warm tea.
Take at least 2 liters of water per day (will help further during your treatment)

Ingredients:
Acai berry, aloe, Chitosan, Garcinia Cambogia, Dietary Fiber, Green Tea, Coenzyme Q10, oriental Waterplantain rhizome.

Expected Results:
-Decreases waist size, belly and where fat is easily accumulated.
-Burn fat.

Ideal age to take ABC Berry:
-People over 18 and under 60.

Caution!
Forbidden for pregnant women, when breastfeeding, people with kidney problems or who have thyroid problems.

name: ~Fruta Bio~
description:
The special blend of Fruta Bio ingredients allow for a quick and safe weight loss solution for both men and women. Whether you're trying to get back in shape after a pregnancy, looking to lose a few pounds for an upcoming wedding, or simply looking to tone your physique, Fruta Bio can help you achieve your weight loss goals.

The key to Fruta Bio's fat fighting formula are the all-natural ingredients, many of which you probably never imagined would be capable of fighting fat. The common fruits and vegetables found in the Fruta Bio formula have been a part of the chinese daily diet for centuries. And now, they're all contained in a simple one-per-day 400mg capsule.

Fruta Bio Diet Pills are:

•Stimulant Free so they won't leave you jittery or sleep deprived.
•100% Natural where all the ingredients are from all natural fruit plants.
•Simple to Take - One pill a day with plenty of water (up to 2 liters).
•Safe for both women and men.

INGREDIENTS:
Fruit Lemon, Balsam Pear, Radish, Spirulina Powder, fruit, pectin.


FREE SHIPPING!!!- when you order 2 or 3 boxes!

name: ~Meizi Power Fruits~
description:
Meizi Power Fruits is composed of natural ingredients which help reduce fat by suppressing uncontrollable appetite and excessive calorie intake. One Box includes a bottle of 30 capsules (Factory Box Plastic Seal + Scratch Off Anti Counterfeit Code). Lose between 8-10 lbs in one month. Meizi Power Fruits is 100% natural and it works great for both, men and women!

Ingredients:
Konicing nut, gamboge fruit, apple, kiwi fruit, konjac extractive powder, sweet potato fiber.

Suitable ages: 18-65

Direction: One (1) capsule per day with plenty of water; min. of 2 liters of water per day!

DO NOT TAKE, IF:

People with coronary heart disease, high blood pressure or cerebrovascular disease;  People with psychosis or addict of drugs, medicine or alcohol;  People with hyperthyroidism, problems of liver or kidney;  People with prostatic hyperplasia or glaucoma;  Women in pregnancy or breast feeding;  People under the age of 18 or above 60;  It can not be taken together with other drugs.

WARNING:
1 capsule a day before or along with breakfast, Do not take more capsules than recommended. 

Do not take this product if you are taking any medications (prescription or over-the-counter) .

Drink more water (min. of 2 liters) and eat more fruits if thirsty (drinking not enough pure water in your body reduces the body's glucose level in the blood, which causes weakness and dizziness).  

Do not skip meals (especially breakfast or lunch). It is important while taking this product to maintain a healthy and balanced diet, including pure water and natural juices.  

Do not consume alcohol while taking these capsules. It may neutralize the effectiveness of the slimming process.

name: ~Meizi Evolution~
description:
BEST BUY! Meizi Evolution helps suppress your hunger allowing you to also kickstart your slow metabolism into higher gear. This is by far 'THE BEST' slimming capsule in the market and will undoubtedly help you lose weight without any side effects. Meizi Evolution does not only reduce the fat in the body, but could also supplement many kinds of amino acids and other trace elements such as copper, iron, phosphorus, calcium, potassium, zinc and selenium to name a few. One bottle includes 30 capsules and it's made for both men and women! Try it now and start noticing the difference right away!

1. Quick effects, faster weight loss (begin losing weight the first week you   take it!).

 2. Formulated with natural botanical extracts without any side effects .

3. Suppress your appetite naturally and without any dieting .


USAGE:

Take 1 pill once per day (the effect will be better when taking the capsule before or along with your breakfast with warm coffee or tea).

INGREDIENTS:

Extracts from Zisu, lotus leaf, oriental water plantain, psyllium husk, bamboo shoot and vegetable oil.

TARGET AREAS: Waist and belly.

SUITABLE AGES: 18-60

DO NOT TAKE, IF:

People with coronary heart disease, high blood pressure or cerebrovascular disease;  People with psychosis or addict of drugs, medicine or alcohol;  People with hyperthyroidism, problems of liver or kidney;  People with prostatic hyperplasia or glaucoma;  Women in pregnancy or breast feeding;  People under the age of 18 or above 60;  It can not be taken together with other drugs.

WARNING:
1 capsule a day before or along with breakfast, Do not take more capsules than recommended. 

Do not take this product if you are taking any medications (prescription or over-the-counter) .

Drink more water (min. of 2 liters) and eat more fruits if thirsty (drinking not enough pure water in your body reduces the body's glucose level in the blood, which causes weakness and dizziness).  

Do not skip meals (especially breakfast or lunch). It is important while taking this product to maintain a healthy and balanced diet, including pure water and natural juices.  

Do not consume alcohol while taking these capsules. It may neutralize the effectiveness of the slimming process.
